original_text: Then the king of Israel said, “Alas! The Lord has called these three kings to give them into the hand of Moab.”
korean_text: 이스라엘 왕이 이르되 슬프다 여호와께서 이 세 왕을 불러 모아 모압의 손에 넘기려 하시는도다 하니

sentences.original_text: Then the king of Israel said,
The Lord has called these three kings
to give them into the hand of Moab.
